Package gameLogic

Class StandardGameStatus

java.lang.Object
gameLogic.StandardGameStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStatus
public class StandardGameStatus extends Object implements GameStatus
This class implement a standard game of Yahtzee! The game will be played using 5 dices with 6 faces each. It also contains the ScoringTable with the current scores.

    • isLegalScoring

      public boolean isLegalScoring(int scoringIndex)
      Check if is legal scoring on the category at index. Is legal to score only if it is not already scored.
      Specified by:
      isLegalScoring in interface GameStatus
      Parameters:
